SiteNameAddress: "15 - 29 The Broadway, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Demolition of existing building and erection of residential-led scheme with six storey residential flats (10 x studios, 55 x one bed and 13 x two bed) above.
Notes: Planning permission CR/2015/0609/FUL. Allocated as a deliverable key housing site in Local Plan Policy H2 (Key Housing Sites).

SiteNameAddress: "21 Broad Walk, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Change of use of first floor retail space to 3 x studio flats and 4 x one bedroom flats with associated works to ground floor providing cycle and refuse storage and upgrading of external elevation (revised description).
Notes: Planning permission CR/2015/0137/FUL.

SiteNameAddress: "44 Goffs Park Road, (formerly Oakhurst Grange), Southgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated in Policy H2 of the Local Plan as ‘housing for older people’. Development of this site should therefore specifically meet the needs of older people, either as a residential care home (C2) or as general housing (C3) which is designed to meet the needs of older people to meet the building regulations part M category 3. The broader design and layout of development on this site should also give specific consideration to the requirements of older people.

SiteNameAddress: "7 - 13 The Broadway & 1 - 3 Queens Square, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Conversion of & alteration to 1st & 2nd floors from ancillary retail (A1) & office (B1) to residential (C3) to provide 18 flats (12 x 1 bed & 6 x 2 bed units) & erection of additional floor to provide 7 flats (2 x 1 bed & 5 x 2 bed units) to give a total of 25 units.
NonHousingDevelopment: retention & refurbishment of existing ground floor retail (A1) units
Notes: Planning permission CR/2015/0694/FUL

SiteNameAddress: "Belgrave House, Station Way, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
PermissionType: planning permission granted under an order
DevelopmentDescription: Prior approval for change of use of ground floor (part), 1st floor, 2nd floor (part) and 3rd floor from B1 (office) to C3 (residential) for 28 residential flats (10 x studio flats, 17 x 1-bedroom flats and 1 x 2-bedroom flat).
Notes: Prior approval CR/2017/0479/PA3. Other permissions: CR/2016/0700/PA3 granted 03/11/2016

SiteNameAddress: "Car Park adjacent to Crawley College, Northgate Avenue, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Identified in the Local Plan Housing Trajectory as a Broad Location for residential development, and in Local Plan Policy EC6 (Development Sites within the Town Centre Boundary) as a site for town centre uses and/or residential development.

SiteNameAddress: "Car Park, 11-13 The Boulevard, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Demolition of existing car park and the erection of a part 3 storey, part 6 storey & part 9 storey building to provide a total of 91 flats with associated parking (amended plans received).
Notes: Planning permission CR/2016/0662/FUL. Site is part of 'Land North of the Boulevard', which is allocated in Local Plan Policies EC6 (Development Sites within the Town Centre Boundary) and H2 (Key Housing Sites) as a 'Town Centre Opportunity Site' for residential development and/or main town centre uses.

SiteNameAddress: "County Buildings, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated as a Town Centre Key Opportunity Site for residential and/or town centre uses in Local Plan Policies EC6 (Development Sites within the Town Centre Boundary) and H2 (Key Housing Sites).

SiteNameAddress: "First & Second Floor 34-40 & 48 The Broadway, Northgate, Crawley (barring 1st Floor at 40)"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
PermissionType: planning permission granted under an order
DevelopmentDescription: Prior approval for change of use from B1 (office) to C3 (residential) for 9 apartments with cycle parking and refuse storage.
Notes: Prior approval CR/2017/0549/PA3. Other permissions: CR/2017/0172/PA3 granted 21/04/2017

SiteNameAddress: "Former depot adj to SW corner of Goffs Park, Old Horsham Road, Southgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Construction of 22 flats in four blocks and 22 houses in five terraces.
Notes: Allocated as a deliverable key housing site in Local Plan Policy H2 (Key Housing Sites).

SiteNameAddress: "Former TSB Site, Russell Way, Three Bridges, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated as a deliverable key housing site in Local Plan Policy H2 (Key Housing Sites). This site formed part of a larger site that was granted permission for residential development on appeal (CR/2005/0812/FUL).

SiteNameAddress: "Kilnmead Car Park, Kilnmead, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated as a deliverable key housing site in Local Plan Policy H2 (Key Housing Sites). The design and layout of the scheme needs to consider the mature trees onsite, and how to accommodate an appropriate number of car parking spaces and amenity land requirements.

SiteNameAddress: "Town Hall, The Boulevard, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Site is part of 'Land North of the Boulevard', which is allocated in Local Plan Policies EC6 (Development Sites within the Town Centre Boundary) and H2 (Key Housing Sites) as a 'Town Centre Opportunity Site' for residential development and/or main town centre uses.

SiteNameAddress: "Land s/o and r/o 24 Brighton Road, Southgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Erection of 14 new apartments, gym and sauna for residents use, bin and bike stores and alterations to the existing parking spaces.
Notes: Planning permission CR/2014/0865/FUL.

SiteNameAddress: "Longley Building, East Park, Southgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated as a developable key housing site in Local Plan Policy H2 (Key Housing Sites)

SiteNameAddress: "Overline House, Crawley Station and adjacent Highway, Station Way, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: mixed ownership
DevelopmentDescription: Outline application (all matters reserved) for demolition of existing office building and integrated railway station building, footbridges and ancillary structures. erection of 308 studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom residential apartments and associated parking (C3 use class).
NonHousingDevelopment: integrated railway station building, footbridges, and ancillary structures; flexible use retail / coffee shop / business centre (a1 / a3 / b1 use classes); 120 space multi-deck station car park, vehicle drop-off lay-by and associated highway works and public realm enhancements
Notes: Allocated as a Town Centre Key Opportunity Site for residential and/or town centre uses in Local Plan Policies EC6 (Development Sites within the Town Centre Boundary) and H2 (Key Housing Sites).

SiteNameAddress: "Stoner House, London Road, Northgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription:
External alterations and extensions to existing building in connection with its use as 111 flats (use class C3), together with site works including landscaping 
(amended description).
Notes: Planning permission CR/2015/0463/FUL. Other permissions: CR/2017/0522/PA3 granted 27/07/2017.

SiteNameAddress: "Sutherland House, Russell Way, Three Bridges, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
PermissionType: planning permission granted under an order
DevelopmentDescription: Prior notification of office to residential (C3) comprising 230 studio apartments with 259 cycle parking spaces and 165 parking spaces (option 3).
Notes: Prior approval CR/2016/0608/PA3. Other permissions: CR/2016/0606/PA3 granted 11/10/2016; CR/2016/0607/PA3 11/10/2016 granted 11/10/2016.

SiteNameAddress: "Telford Place, Three Bridges, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated as a Town Centre Key Opportunity Site for residential and/or town centre uses in Local Plan Policies EC6 (Development Sites within the Town Centre Boundary) and H2 (Key Housing Sites). Site previously had outline consent for a 312-unit residential scheme, but this has now expired (CR/2007/0114/OUT).

SiteNameAddress: "Zurich House, East Park, Southgate, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: Allocated as a deliverable key housing site in Local Plan Policy H2 (Key Housing Sites). This site was subject to a planning permission for 59 residential units which has now expired (CR/2012/0223/FUL).

SiteNameAddress: "Ambulance Station, Ifield Avenue, West Green, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Identified in the Local Plan Housing Trajectory as a suitable and developable site for residential development. There are a significant number of trees within the site particularly along the frontage and rear. The adjoining woodland is a Site of Nature Conservation Importance (SNCI). The impact of any development on trees within and adjoining the site would need to be considered and this is likely to constrain the site’s capacity. Any development is likely to be limited to the footprint of the existing ambulance station although there may be potential for a three storey building providing there is sufficient clearance to the adjoining tree canopies. The yield of the site would be subject to a formal assessment of trees.

SiteNameAddress: "Fire Station, Ifield Avenue, West Green, Crawley"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: Identified in the Local Plan Housing Trajectory as a Broad Location for residential development. Potential for development of the site will vary according to whether or not the fire station remains on site.
